org.rdkit.knime.nodes

Class AbstractRDKitCellFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractCellFactory
      • org.rdkit.knime.nodes.AbstractRDKitCellFactory

  • public abstract class AbstractRDKitCellFactory
extends AbstractCellFactory
    The root class for cell factories producing cells based on or under usage of RDKit objects.
    Author:
    Manuel Schwarze

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AbstractRDKitCellFactory.RowFailurePolicy
      This enumeration defines several policies for handling failures when processing rows during node execution.

      Creates a new cell factory for RDKit based tables.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractRDKitCellFactory

        public AbstractRDKitCellFactory(RDKitObjectCleaner cleaner,
                                AbstractRDKitCellFactory.RowFailurePolicy rowFailurePolicy,
                                WarningConsolidator warningConsolidator,
                                InputDataInfo[] arrInputColumnInfo,
                                DataColumnSpec... outputColumnSpecs)
        Creates a new cell factory for RDKit based tables.
        Parameters:
        cleaner - object to be used for registering RDKit objects for freeing resources. Must not be null.
        rowFailurePolicy - Defines the policy to be used the calculation of row values failed during execution of the node.
        warningConsolidator - Conserves occurring warning messages and consolidates them later. Can be null, if no warnings shall be captured.
        arrInputColumnInfo - Array with information about input columns. Can be null, if the factory will not merge 1:1. This value can also be set later before execution (setInputDataInfos(InputDataInfo[])).
        outputColumnSpecs - Specifications of output columns. Can be empty.

    • Method Detail

      • allowsParallelProcessing

        public boolean allowsParallelProcessing()
        Tells, if the method setAllowParallelProcessing(boolean) was called before with "true" as argument to allow parallel processing. This method exists only, because the method #setParallelProcessing(boolean) does not make the parallel processing flag available and cannot be overridden.
        Returns:
        True if parallel processing is allowed.
        See Also:
        setAllowParallelProcessing(boolean)

      • setAllowParallelProcessing

        public void setAllowParallelProcessing(boolean value)
        Call this method to allow for this factory parallel processing. This method exists only, because the method #setParallelProcessing(boolean) does not make the parallel processing flag available anymore and cannot be overridden. This method calls directly #setParallelProcessing(boolean).
        Parameters:
        value - Set to true to allow parallel processing.
        See Also:
        allowsParallelProcessing(), #setParallelProcessing(boolean)

      • getRowFailurePolicy

        public AbstractRDKitCellFactory.RowFailurePolicy getRowFailurePolicy()
        Returns the configured policy id to be applied when calculation of a row failed.
        Returns:
        Configured policy id.

      • getWarningConsolidator

        public WarningConsolidator getWarningConsolidator()
        Returns the warning consolidator, which is used to save warning messages.
        Returns:
        Warning consolidator.

      • getRDKitObjectCleaner

        public RDKitObjectCleaner getRDKitObjectCleaner()
        Returns the RDKit Object Cleaner object used in this factory to register RDKit objects for cleanup.
        Returns:
        RDKit Object Cleaner.

      • setInputDataInfos

        public void setInputDataInfos(InputDataInfo[] arrInputColumnInfo)
        Makes information about input columns available for the execution. This array will be passed to the #process(InputDataInfo[], DataRow, int) method for every row that needs to be generated by the factory.
        Parameters:
        arrInputColumnInfo - Array with information about input columns. Can be null, if the factory will not merge 1:1. Otherwise it must not be null.

      • setContextStatistics

        public void setContextStatistics(ContextStatistics contextStatistics)
        Sets the context statistics object used to track what has been processed when performing streaming. Otherwise it is not used.
        Parameters:
        contextStatistics - Context statistics. Can be null.

      • getInputDataInfos

        public InputDataInfo[] getInputDataInfos()
        Returns the array of input data info objects describing the input data for this factory. Input data will usually merged with output data.
        Returns:
        Array of input data info objects.

      • getContextForRowCounting

        public WarningConsolidator.Context getContextForRowCounting()
        Returns the context object that this factory should use for counting rows in the context statistics object. The default implementation returns WarningConsolidator.ROW_CONTEXT, which is fine for most cases - it counts input rows. However, if there are for instance multiple tables it is not clear at the end what it refers to, in that case if a factory would work on data coming from a second input table, the warning consolidator should have a context added for ROWS_OF_SECOND_TABLE, and this factory method could be overwritten to return it for correct counting.
        Returns:
        The context to be used for counting processed rows. Can be null.

      • getCells

        public DataCell[] getCells(DataRow row)
        This method will call the method process(...) in the concrete node class, which must contains the RDKit functionality.

      • createEmptyCells

        public static DataCell[] createEmptyCells(int n)
        Creates an array of n empty cells using the Missing Cell instance of KNIME.
        Parameters:
        n - Number of empty cells to return. If n < 0, an empty array will be returned.
        Returns:
        Array with empty cells (missing cells).
        See Also:
        DataType#getMissingCell()

      • mergeDataCells

        public static DataRow mergeDataCells(DataRow row,
                                     DataCell[] arrCells,
                                     int columnToRemove)
        Merges cells of an existing row with additional data cells. Provides the option to eliminate a single column from the input cells.
        Parameters:
        row - Original row. Must not be null. Can be empty.
        arrCells - Cells to be merged. Must not be null. Can be empty.
        columnToRemove - Index of a column that shall be removed from the original row. -1 if all to be kept.
        Returns:
        Result row.

      • process

        public abstract DataCell[] process(InputDataInfo[] arrInputDataInfos,
                                   DataRow row,
                                   long iUniqueWaveId)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates new data cells to be merged with the specified data row, if it is not null. The first parameter contains information about all input values of interest and makes those values easily accessible.
        Parameters:
        arrInputDataInfos - Array of all relevant input data.
        row - Complete data row of input table to be merged. Can be null, if merge is not required.
        iUniqueWaveId - A unique id that should be used for marking RDKit objects for cleanup. Marked objects will be cleaned up automatically at the end of this call. If this is not wanted, the objects should either not be marked for cleanup or they should be marked without an id, which would lead to a cleanup at the end of the entire execution process.
        Returns:
        The new data cells to be appended to the output table.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if processing failed.
